content.heroIntro:
Discover MIRASAL 2, SAMAGUL's latest development in the heart of Los Balcones, Torrevieja. This exclusive project offers just 4 stunning bungalows combining modern design with practical Mediterranean living. Each property features 2-3 bedrooms, built sizes from 65-99m², and prices starting from an exceptional €259,000—45% less than comparable properties on Costa Blanca North.

Developed by SAMAGUL, a trusted name in Torrevieja real estate, MIRASAL 2 delivers quality construction with premium finishes. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday home, or investment property with strong rental potential (€650 per week), this development ticks every box. With completion scheduled for December 1st, 2026, you're investing in a project with proven developer credentials and strategic location advantages.

Located in Los Balcones, one of Torrevieja's most desirable neighborhoods, MIRASAL 2 places you minutes from golden sandy beaches, world-class golf courses, excellent healthcare facilities, and a vibrant expat community. This is more than a property purchase—it's a lifestyle investment in Spain's most welcoming coastal destination.

locationSection.intro: Los Balcones is Torrevieja's premier residential enclave, renowned for its perfect balance of tranquility and convenience. This established neighborhood attracts international buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean living with modern amenities. The area boasts proximity to stunning Blue Flag beaches, excellent schools serving the expat community, and comprehensive healthcare facilities including the prestigious Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja with 24-hour emergency services. Los Balcones offers tree-lined streets, quality restaurants, diverse shopping options, and easy access to championship golf courses. The neighborhood's maturity means excellent infrastructure, reliable public services, and a welcoming multicultural atmosphere where English is widely spoken. Investment values in Los Balcones have grown steadily, with properties appreciating 8% year-on-year, making this location both a lifestyle choice and sound financial decision.

propertyFeatures.intro: MIRASAL 2 represents SAMAGUL's commitment to quality construction and thoughtful design. Each bungalow is built to exacting Spanish building standards with modern thermal efficiency and durability in mind. The developments features energy-efficient double glazing with thermal breaks, pre-installation for air conditioning, and fitted kitchens with quality appliances. Storage solutions, private parking spaces, and landscaped gardens provide practical family living. Contemporary ceramic flooring, modern bathroom fixtures, and video entry systems ensure security and convenience. Whether you choose a 2-bedroom or 3-bedroom layout, the designs maximize natural light and indoor-outdoor living—essential for Mediterranean comfort.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in MIRASAL 2?
faqs.answer: MIRASAL 2 bungalows start from €259,000 for 2-bedroom properties, with 3-bedroom options available. Pricing varies by unit and specifications. Contact our team for current availability and detailed pricing on the 4 available units.

faqs.answer: SAMAGUL is the developer. They have an established track record building quality homes throughout Torrevieja and the Costa Blanca region, known for professional project management and customer service.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Torrevieja hosts Spain's largest expat community with English widely spoken everywhere. Property values appreciate 8% year-on-year. faqs.answer: MIRASAL 2 is approximately 4km from Playa del Cura (Blue Flag), and 6km from La Mata with its golden sand. Both beaches are within 10 minutes by car. Additional beaches include Los Locos and Los Náufragos nearby.

faqs.question: What amenities are near MIRASAL 2?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Mercadona (multiple locations), Carrefour, and Lidl for shopping; Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja and Quirónsalud Torrevieja for healthcare; Villamartín golf course (15 min); El Limonar International School for education; and numerous restaurants, bars, and services. Public transport provides regular connections to Alicante, Murcia, and coastal towns.

faqs.question: What property types are available at MIRASAL 2?
faqs.answer: MIRASAL 2 features modern bungalows with 2-3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and built sizes from 65-99m². Each unit includes private parking, storage rooms, and landscaped gardens. Only 4 units are available in this exclusive development.

The neighborhood provides safe streets, beach access for children, sports facilities including golf courses, and a family-oriented expat community with excellent schools and services.
